org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse

Class EximUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.EximUtil

  • public class EximUtil
extends Object
    EximUtil. Utility methods for the export/import semantic analyzers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EximUtil.SemanticAnalyzerWrapperContext
      Wrapper class for common BaseSemanticAnalyzer non-static members into static generic methods without having the fn signatures becoming overwhelming, with passing each of these into every function.
